description: As a former U.N. Spacy pilot, D.D. (or "Daisy" as he is affectionately known by his friends and comrades) was http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker]`s instructor. After defecting to the Anti-U.N. side, D.D. becomes the leader of a squadron of experimental SV-51 variable fighters. The reason for his defection remains unknown. Sent by the Anti-U.N. as part of the team investigating the alien ruins in Mayan Island, the mission brings him into conflict with his former student, http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker]. An intense rivalry develops between the two as they continue to dogfight to a standstill throughout the whole campaign.Ivanov was later killed when his SV-51 was blown apart by the power of the http://anidb.net/ch50522 [Tori no Hito] while attempting to avenge the death of his lover and wingman http://anidb.net/ch14114 [Nora Polyansky].Source: wiki
name: D.D. Ivanov
